column3: With grand Beaux-Arts styling, it makes for an attractive fa√ßade and profile. Dating from 1913 when it presented live dramas and performances, it has undergone renovations down the decades.After its most recent revamp, it can nowadays be hired for any time of event, drama, music, movies.

An amazing structure with columns depicting every winning film over the decades and spaces for future winners up to around 2070. Lots going on, street artists on every corner, you can even have your own star made! Part of the glamour of Hollywood!
